speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Sarah Johnson?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Sarah. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming, Sarah. I am calling regarding a pending balance on your account. Before we proceed, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Customer
text: I live at 123 Maple Street, Springfield.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Sarah. I can now confirm your account with a balance of $450. How would you like to proceed with this payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I’d like to set up a payment plan if possible.

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, we can arrange that. How much would you be able to pay each month?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, I will set that up for you. Your first payment will be due on the 15th of next month.

speaker: Customer
text: That works for me, thank you.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Sarah. Thank you for your cooperation today. Have a great day!
